reviews.review:
The classic, unremakeable (except by the amazing sequel), brain-stretching first-person puzzle game. One of the classic PC game experiences that your kids and grandkids should play.

It's not particularly long, but the atmosphere, humor, and gameplay are second to none.
If I had the time, I'd come back to this game anytime

Si vous vous interessés a l'univers Portal, go check cette vidéo et vous saurez pourquoi ce jeu est un must have !

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YzpwOJcq1gU
Le deseo el premio a «NO ESTOY LLORANDO, ES QUE SE ME HA METIDO ALGO EN EL OJO», y creo que muchos comprenderán que va antes que el 2.
One of the best games ever. Really good puzzles, good story, nice pacing and an awesome villain.
Es un juego increible, no hay palabras. Plataforma/puzzle de los mejores juegos del mejor genero
Imprescindible.
very nice

portal es un exelente juego de puzzles,si te gusta el genero es una compra obligada,me encanta el villano y su humor hacia la protagonista lo hace muy disfrutable y otra razon para jugarlo.
recomendado.
I don't think I'm going to be making any big waves with this review but Portal is a goddamn gem of a game. Short, sweet and fun. A must own for every gamer.
Beep beep boop bzzzhzhzhzhzhzhzhzhzt Boop
...And now, you're thinking with portals

Portal is a game that takes the idea of a first person shooter and combines it with a puzzle game. 
Pros: good gameplay, story driven gameplay, well thought out puzzles, addictive gameplay.
Cones: once you beat it, the only thing left to do is to try and beat your previous times.
About 3 hours long game,  that became one of the most iconic and memorable PC games. Recommended for innovative gameplay, short but fun story and cheap price. Worth trying out.
The cake is still a lie!!!
Locura de portales!!! algo corto pero muy entretenido y con unos puzles geniales.

Jogaço! Um dos puzzles mais divertidos e intrigantes que já joguei! A história do jogo não é um ponto forte, pois o objetivo é o jogador se divertir com os puzzles, que são muito bem feitos e exigem do jogador atenção.

Por ser um jogo da própria Valve, vive em promoção, e sempre com preço muito baixo! Recomendo, pois vale cada minuto jogado, cada centavo investido.
GG
is good

Have you ever wondered what it's like being a rat in a maze and then thinking to yourself, "This experiment needs more science"?  Then why not try out the Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device and perform "real" science for your robot overlord.  Solve puzzles.  Perform Aerial Acrobatics.  Outsmart Sentient Turrets.  Find companionship with inanimate cubes.  Scared of a little danger, don't even worry about it.  GLaD0S has got your back and so does the great team over at Aperture Science.
Muy buen juego
Corto pero súblime. Recomendado 10/10
"Solo necesito un abrazo"
fag
Just buy it

If you did not play Portal until now, this is the time to get and play it.
Seriously Portal is one of the best games in the past 10 years. Even though the graphics might not be great in comparison (it is a source engine game after all), the puzzles and story definitely both are. The puzzles are easy to begin by not giving you all the features at once. So with every puzzle there is something new and challenging. The story is perfectly integrated into the gameplay, by not interrupting the player to do a certain thing (like newer games often do with cutscenes or script events).
If you read this review while there is still steam sale I wonder why you have read it. The game is €1.99 at the time writing this so do not think about buying, but just do it.
Fun game, good mecanics, good storyline.

Spoiler Alert:








The Cake is a Lie!
Great  thinking game. play it as it is a classic

If you have not played this yet, do so.
If you have already played this, do so again.
Simply one of the best games of all time. To say anything more would be a spoiler. This is more than a game, it is an experience. For Science!
A finely-crafted experience with humor and wit, plus one of the most fun mechanics in gaming. Thinking with portals makes for a great time.
The paloma is a lie
Juego obligatorio en la lista de todo jugador que se precie, no necesita más explicación.
Классика. Когда проходил в первый раз - понравились логические задачки, которые становились всё сложнее во время прохождения.
Ein Klassiker der PC-Spiele-Geschichte und der Beweis dafür, dass Puzzlespiele alles andere als öde sein müssen. Dieses Spiel muss man gespielt haben!
Immer noch ein geniales Spiel.

Я угощу тебя пирогом, говорила она, тебе ничего не угрожает....ложь....все это чертова ложь! ГЛАДОс, как ты могла?!?

Если вкратце, то игра шикарна, обожаю серию Portal и готов играть в них вечно. Довольно интересные головоломки, приправленные сарказмом ГЛАДОс, это просто нечто невообразимое.

Если есть деньги, желание чуточку напрячь свои извилины и улыбнуть свой улыбальник, то эта игра стоит свеч!

I have played this game probably 50+ times. It's one of my all time favourite games. It is so incredibly polished, everything from the level design, the writing, the ideas, it's fantastic. If you know what you're doing, you can beat this game in an hour, so it's not exactly very long, but it doesn't have to be. It's one of those games you wish you could play again. Do yourself a favour and play it if you haven't, or even if you have.
This game still holds up. Almost a perfect game.
Did not expect to play this game for 15 hours.. It was worth every second of it!
play it

И вообще игра просто шикарна прошел 2-ю часть... Игра просто великолепна. Надеюсь VALVE сделают 3-ю

10/10 the final song is the best

This is a game that confused me allot and kept getting stuck 24/7. But i got to  say that i enjoyed every single second of playing this game. Because it takes creativity and a mastermind (not always) to solve the levels ( I didn't use Youtube tutorials at all or maybe i did.....).

You can't go wrong with a game about the careful procedure of cake acquisition through quantum tunnelling.

Fun physics based puzzle game. Clever story and loads of community created maps.
Even though it came out almost 10 years ago, it is still better than most games in the genre.
Only downside is a short campaign, but as I said there is almost unlimited playability in the community created maps.

"Игра легенда", "Нестареющая классика", "Хорошая головоломка" или просто "Хорошая и интересная игра"... Или еще +100500 и один эпитет, который можно легко применить к данной игре.
Лично я хочу просто поделиться впечатлениями от знакомства с этим творением.
Помниться купил я (как тогда водилось - на диске у "пиратов") эту игру... Даже не игру, а комплект игр - так называемый Orange Box. И, вставив диск в CD-ROM, первым делом решил установить игру, с загадочным названием Portal. И хотя в этом комплекте находились такие легенды, как Half-Life 2 и, новые для меня, Half-Life 2: Episode One & Two, играть почему-то я начал именно в Portal. Ну и завис... Я завис... В игре... Очнулся только рано утром на финальных титрах))) Часов 6 пролетело как один миг, но этот миг - один из самых необычных, интересных и незабываемых игровых опытов в моей жизни.
Большое спасибо Valve за украденные из моей жизни 6 часов. Спасибо за GLaDOS и за тортик)))
10 тортиков из 10.
Todo un buen juego. Mecánicas que explorar e historia que conocer.
Un buen juego de estrategia con lo cual te encontrarás con pequeños problemas que te darán un poco de dolor de cabeza pero nada de otro mundo.
One of the Best Games, PLEASE play ALL Portal Games
Jogo rápido e inteligente com um tema diferente e interessante. História bem simples e boa gameplay.
Brilliant puzzle game with a sense of humour - I wish I could play it for the first time again!
La mejor canción que he escuchado en un videojuego 10/10
Jest to chyba jedyna gra , która nawet przy n-tym odpaleniu nigdy się nie nudzi . Jest genialna w swojej prostocie oraz bardzo "smakowita" . W końcu kto nie lubi czekoladowego ciasta :)

This game is a classic of it's kind
If u like/love/idolatrate puzzle games, add this one to your collection
A must play for everyone.
I love this game.

I just can't think of any other game quite like this one (apart from the fantastic sequel). It's hard to know what to add to the thousands of existing reviews that have already been written about it. Perhaps this: 

If, like me, you bought a collection of Valve games because you wanted to play Half Life, you may have Portal sitting in your library, but no clear idea of what it is. PLAY IT. Yes, it' s a 'first-person' 'puzzle' game, but those tags don't do it justice. It's worth your time for the humour and backstory, which are great fun and the source of many a gaming meme. And I think it has one of the best implemented, best calibrated, and best integrated (to the point it's almost imperceptible) tutorials in the history of computer games. Not so much a learning curve, as a learning waterslide of delight.

If you have the sort of brain that can grasp each of the puzzle mechanics as they're introduced, then the few hours you spend finishing Portal will leave you with the sort of self-satisfied contentment you get from watching a great sci-fi mystery movie and guessing the twist. If you can't get your head around it, that's a crying shame, becuase this wsa a groundbreaking, revolutionary game in its time and is, I think, still one of the great games of all time.
Still one of the best puzzle games around.
El juego esta genial lo recomiendo mucho

This game is one of the most well constructed physics based puzzlers you will find. Not only are you solving puzzles, but at times you need to do it while flying through the air at quite some speed. That said, the best bit is aiming for 100% achievement, having to revisit the old levels and see how ineficiently you originally solved them.
наес коробки через порталы тягать
This is a good game.
Great game.

It's short, but that isn't a negative. 
It takes simple mechanics like cube and button based testing, and then continues to reiterate on that throughout the entire game in new and various ways so that new mechanics are rarely introduced, but levels can become more complex and interesting. This is a game where you can complete it in less than an afternoon if you really tried, or you could slow down and appreciate the level design and dialouge in order to complete the game in more time.
There are challenges and trials for people who feel that just the campaign was not challenging enough, or that the game was too short.
This game has lots of replayability, and lots of personality. It's something that you can come back to once a year and it'll still be just as good as it always was.
I highly recommend this game for anyone who has not played it before
es un juego que me gusto bastante por la razón que las pruebas no son ni muy fáciles ni muy complicadas
A must play
Excelente jogo vale cada centavo.

This game.
Is SO GOOD.

If you've never played this game, well, first of all feel your shame.  Second, feel around in the back of your couch for that $2 you've dropped.  Or go fishing for pennies in your closest mall fountain.  Third, buy this game.

When you've realized how great this game is, repeat step two and buy the game for your friends.

I realize it says I've only played 4 hours.  It LIES
The storyline is essentially pretty short.  4 hours-ish to complete all the puzzles.  But I also owned this game on disc back before I had Steam.  I've probably played it through about 3 times.

And here's the thing: it's like $10+ to go see a movie, that can range from 90minutes to 180.  Also, it might really suck.
I guarantee you this game will be some of the most entertaining 4 hours of your life.  Also, it's 1/5th of the price, 



and you get to bring your own doritos.

I am ashamed of myself for taking this long to play this amazing, amazing game.

Forgive me.

А теперь о самом Portal.
Интересный сюжет, подпитанный постоянным ощущением что это ещё явно не конец истории.

Все таки кто бы там что ни говорил, Valve умеют делать настоящие шедевры. Несмотря на то что данная игра короче своей последовательницы, она была настоящим прорывом для своего времени. Многие пеняют на ее "легкость", но, поверьте мне, если вы захотите ПОЛНОСТЬЮ пройти Portal без багоюзов и гуидов, то будете вы это делать достаточно долго и тяжело. Конечно я рекомендую эту игру для покупки, но помните: тортик - ложь!!!

Portal was released in 2007, and it still feels fresh to this day. All the puzzles, the humor, even the graphics look good today.
If you like games that make you feel smarter, this is it!
